title: What song comes into mind when you talk to me? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I talk to anyone (including you, Pri), the first song that I remember first is the one stuck in my head at that moment. The song changes in every three - four days, so I can't name any specific song which I think of while talking to you. But, there's one song which I associate you with a lot: “Believer” by Imagine Dragons. As you might expect, there's a small history behind it, but you didn't ask for it. So I won't talk about it here. SG  PS: this end signature is getting pointless now, yet I can't just stop using it. I've been using it for too long already.
